# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-01-01

### Added
- Initial release
- One-click installation from JSON config files
- Support for Homebrew formulae and casks
- Mac App Store (mas) integration
- Pre and post installation scripts
- Built-in preset library
- Drag-and-drop queue management
- Package deduplication and merging
- Security scanning with command allowlist
- Bash script security analysis
- Config export functionality
- Real-time installation progress tracking

### Security
- Command allowlist validation
- Bash script parsing and security scanning
- Security risk level warnings (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH)
- Context isolation for renderer process
